original_text: But after he had considered this, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream and said, “Joseph son of David, do not be afraid to take Mary home as your wife, because what is conceived in her is from the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 이 일을 생각할 때에 주의 사자가 현몽하여 이르되 다윗의 자손 요셉아 네 아내 마리아 데려오기를 무서워하지 말라 그에게 잉태된 자는 성령으로 된 것이라

sentences.original_text: But after he had considered this
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 이것을 생각해 본 후에

sentences.original_text: an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream
do not be afraid to take Mary home as your wife
because what is conceived in her
